name: VASAGLE Small Coffee Table
description: The large coffee table measures 19.7”Dia. x 15.7”H and the small coffee table measures 15.7”Dia. x 14.2”H; the compact size suitable for small spaces allows you to find the right place for afternoon tea, decorations, or a laptop for work
description2: The mix of quality particleboard and sturdy steel frame makes this side table set stable so that it won't wobble every time you pick up your coffee cup. Each small table can support up to 44 lb

name: Marvelous Lamp
description: Replaceable 3 Bright and Energy-saving LED Bulbs: LEPOWER floor lamp comes with a 9W LED bulb and two 5W LED bulbs for convenient use. No need to shop for bulbs.The standing lamp has a warm color of 3000K bulbs and is very easy on the eyes.
description2: Thicker Lamp Rod and Steady Base: The whole floor lamp is made of high-quality metal except the lampshade. The tree floor lamp rod is much thicker than its counterparts.

name: Round Cofee Table
description: The mobile is compact with its 6.2-inch OLED screen and far lighter at 168g. It perfectly captures the design, looks, and feel of the expensive one. It comes with a snapdragon processor with a 5n chip in it. It has a 200mp camera in the rear 100mp in front perfect for selfie lovers. It also support HDR content means you can watch 4K content on it.

name: Round Cofee Table
description: Accent Coffee Table with Side Table: Elevate your home decor with our 2 Piece Round Side Table Coffee Table Accent Table Set. This set includes a large table providing you with versatile options to enhance your living room, bedroom, balcony, office, or any space in need of a stylish touch.

description2: Charming Sofa: We love the tiny sofa's mid-century modern design. Also we provide 5 popular chic colors for you to choose.

name: Desk
description: 【Sit Stand Desk Adjustable Height 】: This sit-stand desk can be adjusted to a height of 27.6-45.3 inches (67-115cm),
description2: 【Sit Stand Desk Adjustable Height 】: This sit-stand desk can be adjusted to a height of 27.6-45.3 inches (67-115cm), allowing you to customize it to your preferred height.

name: SMUG Standing Desk
description: 【Ergonomic Healthy Style】The ergonomic electric standing desk allows you to release your hands and effortlessly customize the desired height between 28.7''- 48''. With a high-quality motor, our adjustable desk operates quietly at less than 55dB and can be used with confidence even in the quietest room.
description2: 【Precise & Stable Adjustment】Designed to cater to your needs, our stand up desk design features an LED display and 3 memory presets, helping you make precise and quick adjustments. The robust wooden desktop and the T-shaped steel frame ensure maximum stability and can hold up to 176 lbs.

name: VECELO Computer Desk
description: 【Keyboard Tray & Storage Shelves】Corner desk with keyboard tray and two open shelves on the side provides working space and extra plenty of storage space.Both sides of the corner desk are 29.5 inches
description2: 【Sturdy & Durable】Made of high quality MDF which ensures sturdy and durable.It provides enough durable work surfaces.

name: Office Small Computer Desk
description: 【Multi Scenes】Our desk is available in a variety of sizes and colors for the perfect match, allowing you to have a unique user experience. This home office desk is suitable for most people, including executives, teachers, and secretaries
description2: High-quality Materials】This work desk for home office also features a waterproof and scratch-resistant desktop. Easy to clean, long service life
